FlavorText.Text: Hello, [L_LeaderName]. I am [NPCName]. I'm looking for a good sovereign to aid, and it is obvious to me that you have a great destiny ahead of you.
Hello, [L_LeaderName]. I am [NPCName]. I'm looking for a strong sovereign to aid. If you allow me to join you I will be a loyal member of your growing empire.

Hello, [L_LeaderName]. I am [NPCName]. I chronicle the events for the world of [WorldName]. I'm looking for a good sovereign to aid, and it is obvious to me that you have a great destiny ahead of you.
Terrible news, My Lord. Several adventurers tried to enter the Wildlands and found one of Morrigan's lost artifacts and set loose mayhem out in the wilderness.
I've received a disturbing report, My Lord. A group of so-called adventurers tried to explore the Wildlands. In the process, they inadvertently set free a hoard of creatures long thought extinct.
I am sad to report that travelers are reporting new and more powerful creatures in the wilds. Apparently a bunch of do-gooders tried to destroy one of the Wildlands and failed...miserably.

There are reports of some new dangerous creatures prowling the wilds. We have advised our people to avoid the forests where they tend to be most often found. As long as the Wildlands exist, more and more dangerous creatures will harass us.

I have some disturbing news, My Lord. A party consisting of a wizard, a warrior, a cleric and a thief attempted to overthrow the lord of the Wildlands. Naturally, they perished but in the process the minions of the Wildlands have begun raiding villages and travelers well beyond the boundaries of the Wildlands.

I have just gotten word from our rangers that they have spotted some new terrors escaping from the Wildlands. As long as the Wildlands are allowed to exist, more and more terrible creatures will appear in our lands.

Your majesty, we are getting reports from our scouts that they are finding new notable locations of greater intrigue. These places may contain secrets, long lost or artifacts that may aid us. The scouts refer to these as level [LEVEL] locations.
